reviews.review_msg: This is his first time teaching. First impression wise, it can get a bit awkward from time to time. However, his lecture slide is very useful and clear. His exams are fair. He is also very responsive either through email or meeting him in person. Pay attention to his lecture slides. Some questions may come up during the exam.

One of the best professors I've met at SFU, do not hesitate to take his class. Aside from well-taught lectures, he makes really good jokes. I honestly wished he taught more courses, especially the CMPT ones.
His exams are fair enough. Make sure you study lecture slides and sample questions given by the prof!

Ryan is overall an amazing instructor! The course material is famous for being hard, but he did a very good job of teaching. His exams are fair, grading from TAs can sometimes be weird, but if you bring it up to him, he will fix it for you Tips for future students: ALWAYS ALWAYS ALWAYS review his slides, he will take questions from there on exams.
